title: Changing my name - but in the messages app
content:
On my google account that is connected to my phone I have one name, and it is this name everywhere on my phone EXCEPT in the messages app. When I click to expand a photo I have sent, it displays the name previously associated with my account and I can't figure out how/where to change it. Everywhere I look in settings of my account it has the correct name, so I am not seeing where it is getting the old name from.
Edit: have tried clearing the app cache and data
